description: Microsoft Support and Recovery Assistant(SaRA) is a desktop client that enables Microsoft customers to troubleshoot and diagnose their issues.

uninstaller.script: Get-ItemProperty HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall\* | Where-Object { $_.HelpLink -eq "https://aka.ms/SaRA_Home*" } | Select-Object -ExpandProperty UninstallString | ForEach-Object { cmd.exe /c "$_" }
